title: Taylor Gontineac
text:
Taylor Gontineac (born 16 July 2000) is a French-born <a href="Romanian%20people">Romanian</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> rugby player who is the son of former <a href="Romania%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Romania Rugby</a> legend and former captain <a href="Romeo%20Gontineac">Romeo Gontineac</a>. He plays as a <a href="Centre%20%28rugby%20union%29">centre</a> for professional <a href="Top%2014">Top 14</a> club <a href="ASM%20Clermont%20Auvergne">ASM Clermont Auvergne</a>`s espoirs.
Club career.
Taylor Gontineac started playing rugby in his hometown of Aurillac for local teams influenced by his father Romeo Gontineac. Then due to his success, Taylor scored a contract with <a href="ASM%20Clermont%20Auvergne">ASM Clermont Auvergne</a> to play for their Espoirs team and in the future to play for the <a href="Top%2014">Top 14</a> side.
